top_cards.title: Export Control Impact
top_cards.one_liner: Export controls freeze chip supply chain.
top_cards.kill_switch: Any structural change to export control decree.
top_cards.authority_sentence: Export controls freeze chip supply chain.

trigger_quote.excerpt: Effective immediately, all exports of specialized semiconductor chips to listed entities are suspended pending further technical review.
